page.title: 02Whitfield School
page.content: Whitfield County Primary School was opened in 1967. At present our school has 12 teachers (plus headmaster), 2 welfare assistants, 1 clerical, 3 cooks, 5 midday supervisors and 3 cleaners. The school opened with 164 children throughout the years. The highest was in 1978 when 425 children attended from September to September. We now have 334. Here are some clubs after school and at breaktime. Mondays -Super skills, Gymnastics Tuesdays -Choir, Calligraphy Wednesdays -Country Dancing Thursdays -Creative Dance There are roughly 70 children staying for school dinner, 220 for packed lunch and 40 go home. We found out that the favourite meal is fish fingers and chips.
